channel.title: What are your top 10 game engines from this decade?
channel.description: So what are your guys favorite game engines? 10. Anvil Engine 9. Frostbite 2.0 8. IW engine/ ID tech 3 7. Naughty Dog Engine 6. Dead Engine 5. Gamebyro 4. CryEngine 3 3. Unity 3D 2. Source 1. Unreal Engine 3

item.title: What are your top 10 game engines from this decade?
item.dc:creator: Aaron
item.description:
Whatever Skyrim runs on

Read full topic
item.source: What are your top 10 game engines from this decade?

item.description:

item.title: What are your top 10 game engines from this decade?
item.dc:creator: Firewall
item.description:
Kairouseki:

RAGE engine is the engine that GTAIV and RDR run on.

I get it

RAGE = Rockstar Advanced Game Engine.

RAGE would be ID Tech 5 i think.

Rage is the Id Tech 5 engine due to the fact that RAGE is being developed be Id Software.

item.title: What are your top 10 game engines from this decade?
item.dc:creator: Jethrosoup
item.description:
I understand if you’re a developer or something that would give you an actual reason to care about game engines, but even then, why would you ever need to list ten?

Read full topic
item.source: What are your top 10 game engines from this decade?

item.title: What are your top 10 game engines from this decade?
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
xalener:

LOLOLOLOLOLOL!!!

People have made shit in GldSrc that looks BETTER than source.

As for a favorite engine, I’d say the Quake engine. I mean shitloads of games are still built on it.

This has me interested. Anything specific that I could see?

Read full topic
item.source: What are your top 10 game engines from this decade?

item.title: What are your top 10 game engines from this decade?
item.dc:creator: navand
item.description:
gordonfreemantshephard:

As true as that is, the title of this thread states that we are supposed to choose our favorite engines from this decade goldsrc does not fit into this category.

We are also supposed to mention 10, in preference order.

Anywho, Homeworld 2’s engine. That game was beautiful.

Read full topic
item.source: What are your top 10 game engines from this decade?

item.title: What are your top 10 game engines from this decade?
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
Maxey:

No, RAGE is the name of GTA4/Red Dead Redemption’s engine.

Yes.

IIRC Liberty City Stories and Vice City Stories were the first games to use the RAGE engine. Obviously in a very stripped down form.

Read full topic
item.source: What are your top 10 game engines from this decade?

item.title: What are your top 10 game engines from this decade?
item.dc:creator: mankyman6
item.description:
DMM
Euphoria
Havok
Cryengine 3
Source

I would also like to add the Creation Engine on the side, because we haven’t been able to play in it yet, but it looks pretty bad ass with what’s being done with it.

Read full topic
item.source: What are your top 10 game engines from this decade?
